column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's worth calling ahead on weekends
column2: as the restaurant is relatively compact and can fill up quickly with hungry twenty-somethings (open til 2 AM on Fridays and Saturdays). There are stand-alone tables along the sides that accommodate groups of 2 or 4
column3: but larger parties will have to make do with communal seating at the center. While sitting next to strangers might not be ideal
column4: at least the scenery is cool
